articles.title: Anant Ambani's pre-wedding: Rihanna, Gates and Zuckerberg at India tycoon's gala - BBC.com
articles.description: Asia's richest man reportedly welcomed more than 1,000 guests to the three-day extravaganza in India.
articles.content:
By Meryl Sebastian and Flora DruryBBC News
Pop star Rihanna (third from left) with members of the Ambani family
Five hundred dishes, more than a thousand guests and a multi-million dollar budget - … [+2867 chars]
